channel.title: Connection Reset
channel.description: I often get this message while i'm running my server : [code]Connection reset java.net.SocketException: Connection reset at java.net.SocketInputStream.read(Unknown Source) at client.fillInStream(client.java:9464) at client.run(client.java:18276) at java.lang.Thread.run(Unknown Source)[/code] And some people get disconnected, does anyone know what is causing this?

item.title: Connection Reset
item.dc:creator: @dopeman dopeman
item.description:
@dopeman wrote:

search ur client.java for “reset” and look around

Read full topic

item.title: Connection Reset
item.dc:creator: @Mitko Mitko
item.description:
@Mitko wrote:

I often get this message while i’m running my server :

Connection reset java.net.SocketException: Connection reset at java.net.SocketInputStream.read(Unknown Source) at client.fillInStream(client.java:9464) at client.run(client.java:18276) at java.lang.Thread.run(Unknown Source)
And some people get disconnected, does anyone know what is causing this?

Read full topic
